boxes.name: File Type Box
boxes.summary: Identifies the file type and compatibility brands for the bitstream.

boxes.name: Movie Box
boxes.summary: Top-level container for movie metadata including tracks and timing information.

boxes.name: Track Box
boxes.summary: Container describing a single track within the presentation.

boxes.name: Track Header Box
boxes.summary: Defines the characteristics of a track, including ID, duration, and display parameters.

boxes.name: Media Data Box
boxes.summary: Holds the raw media samples referenced by the track sample tables.

boxes.name: KLV Sample Entry
boxes.summary: Carries SMPTE KLV sample metadata using a registered UUID container.
